testInfo.name: Gesamtfragenkatalog zum Test „Leben in Deutschland“ und zum „Einbürgerungstest“

questions.germanQuestion: Welches Wappen gehört zum Bundesland Niedersachsen?
questions.englishQuestion: Which coat of arms belongs to the state of Niedersachsen?
questions.notes: The coat of arms of Niedersachsen represents the state and its heritage.
questions.learningTechniques: Focus on identifying the unique elements of the Niedersachsen coat of arms.

resources.description: Learn more about the coat of arms of Niedersachsen.

questions.germanQuestion: Welches ist ein Landkreis in Niedersachsen?
questions.englishQuestion: Which is a district (Landkreis) in Niedersachsen?
questions.notes: The 'Ammerland' is a district located in the state of Niedersachsen.
questions.learningTechniques: Familiarize yourself with the names of districts within Niedersachsen, especially 'Ammerland.'

resources.description: Learn more about the districts in Niedersachsen.

questions.germanQuestion: Für wie viele Jahre wird der Landtag in Niedersachsen gewählt?
questions.englishQuestion: For how many years is the state parliament (Landtag) in Niedersachsen elected?
questions.notes: The state parliament in Niedersachsen is elected for a term of 5 years.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that the term length for the Landtag in Niedersachsen is 5 years, similar to other German federal states.

resources.description: Learn more about the political system in Niedersachsen.

questions.germanQuestion: Ab welchem Alter darf man in Niedersachsen bei Kommunalwahlen wählen?
questions.englishQuestion: At what age can you vote in local elections in Niedersachsen?
questions.notes: In Niedersachsen, citizens can participate in local elections starting at the age of 16.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that 16 is the voting age for local elections in Niedersachsen, allowing young citizens to engage in their community's political process.

resources.description: Learn more about voting rights in Niedersachsen.

questions.germanQuestion: Welche Farben hat die Landesflagge von Niedersachsen?
questions.englishQuestion: What are the colors of the state flag of Niedersachsen?
questions.notes: The state flag of Niedersachsen consists of the colors black, red, and gold.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember the black, red, and gold colors of Niedersachsen's flag, which reflect the state's heritage.

resources.description: Learn more about the flag of Niedersachsen.

questions.germanQuestion: Wo können Sie sich in Niedersachsen über politische Themen informieren?
questions.englishQuestion: Where can you get information on political topics in Niedersachsen?

options.germanOption: bei der Landeszentrale für politische Bildung
options.englishOption: at the State Center for Civic Education

questions.notes: In Niedersachsen, the 'Landeszentrale für politische Bildung' (State Center for Civic Education) is the key institution for learning about political topics.
questions.learningTechniques: Focus on the role of the 'Landeszentrale für politische Bildung' in educating the public about political matters in Niedersachsen.

resources.description: Learn more about the State Center for Civic Education in Niedersachsen.

questions.englishQuestion: The state capital of Niedersachsen is called ...
questions.notes: The state capital of Niedersachsen is Hannover, a major city known for its trade fairs and cultural heritage.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that Hannover is the capital of Niedersachsen, a significant economic and cultural hub in the region.

resources.description: Learn more about Hannover, the capital of Niedersachsen.

questions.notes: Niedersachsen is located in the northwestern part of Germany and is one of the country's 16 federal states.
questions.learningTechniques: Familiarize yourself with the geographical location of Niedersachsen on a map of Germany.

resources.description: Learn more about the geography of Niedersachsen.

questions.germanQuestion: Wie nennt man die Regierungschefin/den Regierungschef in Niedersachsen?
questions.englishQuestion: What is the title of the head of government in Niedersachsen?
questions.notes: The head of government in Niedersachsen is called the 'Ministerpräsidentin' or 'Ministerpräsident,' a title equivalent to 'Minister-President.'
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that the title 'Ministerpräsident' is used for the heads of government in German federal states, including Niedersachsen.

resources.description: Learn more about the role of the Minister-President in Germany.

questions.germanQuestion: Welche Ministerin/welchen Minister hat Niedersachsen nicht?
questions.englishQuestion: Which minister does Niedersachsen not have?
questions.notes: Niedersachsen, like other German federal states, does not have a Foreign Minister ('Außenminister'), as foreign affairs are handled at the federal level.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that federal states in Germany do not have foreign ministers, as foreign policy is the responsibility of the federal government.

resources.description: Learn more about the structure of state governments in Germany.
